alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 11:16AM PST until January 12 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...The threat for light to moderate snow has generally ended for the day. The threat of heavy snow will likely return late tonight and continue through Friday. * WHERE...Moscow, Rosalia, Lewiston, Lewiston Grade, Colfax, Culdesac, Tekoa, Uniontown, Genesee, Soldiers Meadow Road, Nezperce, Gifford, Alpowa Summit, Pomeroy, Peck, Plummer, Winchester, Oakesdale, La Crosse, Potlatch, Craigmont, Kamiah, Clarkston, Pullman, and Lapwai. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
